actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Larry Land, Marie Land, Brian Land, Keith Land, Patricia Vandenberg, Lorri Vandenberg, James W. Land, Lois Land, Tamra Lee Land, Sandra Gay Land, Vincent James Land, Viola Hollenbaugh, William L. Phinney, Sr., Emily V. Phinney, Lora Phinney, and William L. Phinney, Jr.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay 16 named individuals in satisfaction of certain claims against the United States.
